buckshot.name: ğŸ° Buckshot Roulette
buckshot.rules: ğŸ“– Buckshot Roulette Rules ğŸ¯ Game Objective: Survive longer than your opponent ğŸ”« Gameplay: â€¢ The shotgun has shells (live and blank) â€¢ Player can shoot themselves or opponent â€¢ Live shell takes 1 HP, blank - 0 â€¢ Player with 0 HP loses ğŸ Items: ğŸ” Magnifying Glass - reveal current shell type ğŸº Beer - eject current shell â›“ï¸ Handcuffs - make opponent skip turn ğŸš¬ Cigarettes - restore 1 HP ğŸ”ª Knife - next shot deals double damage ğŸ”„ Turns: â€¢ If you shoot yourself with blank - turn stays yours â€¢ If you shoot opponent or with live - turn passes to them â€¢ If shells run out - new round with new shells ğŸ† Victory: Last player alive or more HP after all rounds

blackjack.name: ğŸƒ BlackJack
blackjack.rules: ğŸ“– BlackJack Rules ğŸ¯ Game Objective: Get 21 points or closer to 21 than dealer ğŸƒ Cards: â€¢ 2-10: card value â€¢ Jack, Queen, King: 10 points â€¢ Ace: 1 or 11 points (automatically) ğŸ® Gameplay: â€¢ Each player gets 2 cards â€¢ Can take additional cards (Hit) â€¢ Can stop (Stand) â€¢ Can split pair (Split) ğŸ’¥ Bust: More than 21 points = loss ğŸ† Victory: â€¢ 21 points (BlackJack) â€¢ More points than dealer â€¢ Dealer busts ğŸ’° Payouts: â€¢ Win: 1:1 â€¢ BlackJack: 3:2 â€¢ Tie: bet returned
